name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performs a cover of 'Super Shooter' by RIP SLYME.
Merchandise and new song announcement section after the live concert.

subtitles.original: We got shoot, 攻めるクルー、奴が来るアドバンス取って進む
subtitles.english: We got shoot, the attacking crew, he's coming, take the advantage and move forward

subtitles.english: We got shoot, the attacking crew, he's coming, take the advantage and move forward

subtitles.original: X, Z, Z, Crash!

subtitles.english: X, Z, Z, Crash!

subtitles.original: Hey coming up, 神のみぞ知る、犬に印、しっかりリンク、シンとシン
subtitles.english: Hey coming up, only God knows, sign the dog, link properly, core to core

subtitles.original: 一人きり切り開けキラー、生き残るために握るトリガー
subtitles.english: Break through on your own, killer, the trigger you pull to survive

subtitles.original: セットアップしたフルメトロジャケット
subtitles.english: Set up full metro jacket

subtitles.original: テンポアップで点々ダダダ、Round 2、新しい世界
subtitles.english: Tempo up and dots da-da-da, Round 2, new world

subtitles.original: Brand new fantasy, Two-hand shooter
subtitles.english: Brand new fantasy, Two-hand shooter

subtitles.original: 進呈してみせろソレ運動、切り返した出術じっくり動、動、動、変えてない
subtitles.english: Show us your gift, that exercise, the switched-back technique moves slowly, move, move, hasn't changed

subtitles.original: 海千が流れる、白い旗あげても止まらない
subtitles.english: A veteran flows, won't stop even if you raise a white flag

subtitles.original: De-Point 加算 加速するマザー
subtitles.english: De-Point addition, accelerating mother

subtitles.original: Can't get any harder, この体 バラバラ
subtitles.english: Can't get any harder, this body's in pieces

subtitles.original: 残れ体、Let's continue まだまだ
subtitles.english: Remain body, Let's continue, still more to go

subtitles.original: おー、ほらスタート テイクオフ、いつも遠くにパブリックエネミー
subtitles.english: Oh, look, start, takeoff, always far away, public enemy

subtitles.original: 心のモヤ 不安の煙に、負けずまずはファーストブリーズ
subtitles.english: Don't lose to the haze in your heart or the smoke of anxiety, first, the first breeze

subtitles.original: 負けぬ在庫踏まえ、わがままだけのプラン
subtitles.english: Based on non-losing stock, a plan of just selfishness

subtitles.original: 当てもなくに歪んだスリー、飛ばすシンとラン
subtitles.english: An aimlessly distorted three, sending the core and the run

subtitles.original: サイレン鳴り響く 集まる鳴くデイ
subtitles.english: Siren rings out, a gathering, crying day

subtitles.original: 誰もが待っていきせい 希望 君がヒーロー
subtitles.english: Everyone's waiting for high spirits, hope, you're the hero

subtitles.original: 負けると思うたって 立って、Yo たって立って
subtitles.english: Even if you think you'll lose, stand up, stand up, Yo, stand up, stand up

subtitles.original: 捕らえるロックオン、避けることせず、さぁ体張って
subtitles.english: Catch the lock-on, without avoiding, come on, put your body on the line

subtitles.original: Yo、さすらいのガンナー、虚空のハンター
subtitles.english: Yo, wandering gunner, hunter of the void

subtitles.original: Continue、次は誰だ？お前の番だ！
subtitles.english: Continue, who's next? It's your turn!

subtitles.original: S-O-S、チェック ザ テスト、ボケボケつったってれば速攻ゼン
subtitles.english: S-O-S, check the test, if you're just standing around dazed, it's an immediate Zen

subtitles.original: ナイスアタック、ナイスディフェンス、必要なのはサバイバルのセンス
subtitles.english: Nice attack, nice defense, what's needed is a survival sense

subtitles.original: 行けろ 行けろ Here we go Here we go、ハイマース、明日はお前がヒーロー
subtitles.english: Go, go, Here we go, here we go, High-mers, tomorrow you'll be the hero

subtitles.original: Big shooter、生き急いで、Blazing beat you up、切り開いて break
subtitles.english: Big shooter, living fast, Blazing beat you up, break through, break

subtitles.original: Shot shooter、生き急いで、Crazy 照準合う、至近距離で break
subtitles.english: Shot shooter, living fast, Crazy aim's set, at point-blank range, break

subtitles.original: Big shooter、生き急いで、Blazing beat you up、切り開いて break
subtitles.english: Big shooter, living fast, Blazing beat you up, break through, break

subtitles.original: Shot shooter、生き急いで、Crazy 照準合う、至近距離で break
subtitles.english: Shot shooter, living fast, Crazy aim's set, at point-blank range, break

subtitles.original: Yo, Dead Beats, did you enjoy the show? I've got a couple more announcements for you
subtitles.english: Yo, Dead Beats, did you enjoy the show? I've got a couple more announcements for you

subtitles.original: before we head off to the MV premiere and then the members-only encore performance
subtitles.english: before we head off to the MV premiere and then the members-only encore performance

subtitles.original: at 9:15 JST. So don't head out yet, okay?
subtitles.english: at 9:15 JST. So don't head out yet, okay?

subtitles.original: はい、お知らせあります！
subtitles.english: Yes, I have announcements!

subtitles.original: You know what time it is? Goods time! These are technically to celebrate
subtitles.english: You know what time it is? Goods time! These are technically to celebrate

subtitles.original: my fourth anniversary, but they're themed around today's show.
subtitles.english: my fourth anniversary, but they're themed around today's show.

subtitles.original: そうです、グッズあります！
subtitles.english: That's right, there's merch!

subtitles.original: First off, we've got a poster from the underground. It's a huge poster of me, Mori Calliope,
subtitles.english: First off, we've got a poster from the underground. It's a huge poster of me, Mori Calliope,

subtitles.original: in Underworld-ian street fashion promoting my J-Rap themed live show.
subtitles.english: in Underworld-ian street fashion promoting my J-Rap themed live show.

subtitles.original: A nice memory of our night together in Neo-Tokyo.
subtitles.english: A nice memory of our night together in Neo-Tokyo.

subtitles.original: とっても素敵なポスターです！
subtitles.english: It's a very wonderful poster!

subtitles.original: Want to write lyrics? Scribble doodles? Write letters to fictional characters
subtitles.english: Want to write lyrics? Scribble doodles? Write letters to fictional characters

subtitles.original: about everyone who bullied you in school? About existential thoughts that plague you daily?
subtitles.english: about everyone who bullied you in school? About existential thoughts that plague you daily?

subtitles.original: Grab a Mori-themed notebook! It's a super cute design with lots of mini Moraries running around it,
subtitles.english: Grab a Mori-themed notebook! It's a super cute design with lots of mini Moraries running around it,

subtitles.original: so make it yours today. とっても素敵なノートです！
subtitles.english: so make it yours today. It's a very wonderful notebook!

subtitles.original: Are you ready to shed your mortal coil and become an actual skeleton?
subtitles.english: Are you ready to shed your mortal coil and become an actual skeleton?

subtitles.original: Well, if you did that, Mori would get in huge trouble, so for now, how about a Dead Beat themed hoodie?
subtitles.english: Well, if you did that, Mori would get in huge trouble, so for now, how about a Dead Beat themed hoodie?

subtitles.original: You could also use it as a Halloween costume as a regular old skeleton, but cooler. It's super comfy,
subtitles.english: You could also use it as a Halloween costume as a regular old skeleton, but cooler. It's super comfy,

subtitles.original: so make sure you grab it. とっても素敵なフーディです！
subtitles.english: so make sure you grab it. It's a very wonderful hoodie!

subtitles.original: Finally, we have... Oh God. Oh God. No, wait, no, not that thing.
subtitles.english: Finally, we have... Oh God. Oh God. No, wait, no, not that thing.

subtitles.original: Wait, Mane-chan... Mane-chan, wasn't there something else we were selling? Like a water bottle or something?
subtitles.english: Wait, Mane-chan... Mane-chan, wasn't there something else we were selling? Like a water bottle or something?

subtitles.original: Why is this weird freaking cat here? Okay, I'm being told to roll with it.
subtitles.english: Why is this weird freaking cat here? Okay, I'm being told to roll with it.

subtitles.original: Uh, Weird Cat is here as a cute plushie for your Mori plushie collection.
subtitles.english: Uh, Weird Cat is here as a cute plushie for your Mori plushie collection.

subtitles.original: Just look, if you buy this thing, be careful, okay? I don't claim any responsibility
subtitles.english: Just look, if you buy this thing, be careful, okay? I don't claim any responsibility

subtitles.original: for whatever happens to you after. とっても怖いぬいぐるみです！
subtitles.english: for whatever happens to you after. It's a very scary plushie!

subtitles.original: If you buy all these pieces of merch, you'll get this: a sticker sheet full of mini Moraries.
subtitles.english: If you buy all these pieces of merch, you'll get this: a sticker sheet full of mini Moraries.

subtitles.original: Stick them onto your car, your computer, your little brother's Switch and see how angry he gets.
subtitles.english: Stick them onto your car, your computer, your little brother's Switch and see how angry he gets.

subtitles.original: I don't know, they're your stickers now, so do whatever you want with them, I guess. 全部のグッズ買ったら、素敵なステッカーもらえます！
subtitles.english: I don't know, they're your stickers now, so do whatever you want with them, I guess. If you buy all the goods, you'll get a wonderful sticker!

subtitles.original: Now that merch is out of the way, let's talk about my brand new song releasing.
subtitles.english: Now that merch is out of the way, let's talk about my brand new song releasing.

subtitles.original: That's right folks, a brand new J-Rap single titled 'FLASH BANG' is coming out right after this stream.
subtitles.english: That's right folks, a brand new J-Rap single titled 'FLASH BANG' is coming out right after this stream.

subtitles.original: I got to make a song with the J-Rap legend PES-sama, one of the most iconic rappers...
subtitles.english: I got to make a song with the J-Rap legend PES-sama, one of the most iconic rappers...
